main_definition: October is the tenth month of the year in the Gregorian calendar, often associated with autumnal themes and Halloween.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to the month of October
meanings_and_examples.example: She received her exam results during the first week of october.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom used humorously or sarcastically when something happens in the month of October
meanings_and_examples.example: Look at this weird gadget I got for my birthday. It arrived on a Friday, right in the middle of october!

meanings_and_examples.definition: October-themed jokes or phrases used in humor and entertainment
meanings_and_examples.example: The TV show 'October Fever' became popular for its hilarious October-themed content.
